meanings.sent1: The butterfly had symmetrical wings, with each side looking the same.
meanings.sent2: The snowflake was perfectly symmetrical, with each arm identical to the others.
meanings.sent3: The clown's face paint was supposed to be symmetrical, but ended up looking lopsided and funny.
meanings.sent4: The symmetrical pattern of the wallpaper created a sense of harmony in the room.
meanings.sent5: The symmetrical design of the building made it stand out among the rest.

meanings.definition: Corresponding in size, shape, and position on opposite sides of a dividing line or plane.
meanings.sent1: The symmetrical arrangement of the flowers made the garden look balanced.
meanings.sent2: Her earrings were symmetrical, with a pearl on each side.
meanings.sent3: The symmetrical rows of trees along the road looked like soldiers standing in formation.
meanings.sent4: The symmetrical layout of the chessboard made it easier to strategize.
meanings.sent5: The symmetrical alignment of the planets in the sky was a rare sight to behold.
